## Enhancements made

- Refactor rendering for `outputs` AST changes [#571](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/571) ([`@agoose77`](https://github.com/agoose77), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@stevejpurves`](https://github.com/stevejpurves))

## Bugs fixed

- üëÆ non-fatal fallbacks for `output` [#736](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/736) ([`@stevejpurves`](https://github.com/stevejpurves), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))
- üöõ migrate content for cross references [#733](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/733) ([`@stevejpurves`](https://github.com/stevejpurves), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1))
- Fix base URL behavior in top nav [#730](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/730) ([`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1))
- Add more types to button style [#728](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/728) ([`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))
- Remove starting slash from URLParams for launch buttons [#724](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/724) ([`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1))
- Fix inline images [#710](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/710) ([`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@agoose77`](https://github.com/agoose77), [`@akhmerov`](https://github.com/akhmerov), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))
- Fix whitespace of nav components [#703](https://github.com/jupyter-book/myst-theme/pull/703) ([`@choldgraf`](https://github.com/choldgraf), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@netlify`](https://github.com/netlify), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1))
